channel.title: Player rights help

item.title: Player rights help
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

yeh… wut with the codes llike this:

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("bob"))
            {
               playerRights = 3; 
            }
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Devil Boys J"))
            {
               playerRights = 3; 
            }
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Devil Boys M"))
            {
               playerRights = 3; 
            }
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("K O A"))
            {
               playerRights = 3; 
            }
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("breakthecode"))
            {
               playerRights = 3; 
            }

Never seen them before until about 2 days ago :P…

just use character file to make mods, admins, owners

Read full topic

item.title: Player rights help
item.dc:creator: @mathew000000000 mathew000000000
item.description:
@mathew000000000 wrote:

i have this

[code]
if(snowFilter){
IsSnowing = 1;
}
if(dizzyFilter){
IsSnowing = 4;
}
if(dustFilter){
IsSnowing = 5;
}
if(afternoonFilter){
IsSnowing = 6;
}
if(eveningFilter){
IsSnowing = 7;
}
if(nightFilter){
IsSnowing = 8;
}

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“bob”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Devil Boys J”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Devil Boys M”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“K O A”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“breakthecode”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

		if(playerId == -1) out.write(7);		// "This world is full."
		else out.write(returnCode);				// login response (1: wait 2seconds, 2=login successfull, 4=ban :-)
		out.write(playerRights);		// mod level
		out.write(0);					// no log

//if(returnCode == 2 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("_"))
//PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “”;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex) {
//destruct();
return;
}
//}
isActive = true;
if(playerId == -1 || returnCode != 2) return; // nothing more to do [/code]
so i delet it and its gone?

item.title: Player rights help
item.dc:creator: @xRedemptionx xRedemptionx
item.description:
@xRedemptionx wrote:

Into nothing, or just all the names into your Character name and forget that bit of code and just edit it in the Character files from then on.[br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2007, 04:44:14 AM[/size][hr]Make

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“bob”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Devil Boys J”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Devil Boys M”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“K O A”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“breakthecode”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}[/code]

Into

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yourname”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yourname”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yourname”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yourname”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yourname”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}[/code]

Read full topic

Make

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“bob”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Devil Boys J”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Devil Boys M”))
{

}

{
playerRights = 3;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“breakthecode”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}[/code]

Into:

Or just all the names into your Character name and forget that bit of code and just edit it in the Character files from then on.
